thread.section_title: Victory Tax Solutions Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Victory Tax Solutions | www.victorytaxsolutions.com
thread.title: Dale Landry
thread.title_full: Victory Tax Solutions reviewed by Dale Landry

author: Dale Landry
title: Dale Landry
text:
The professional team at Victory Tax Solutions has been vital in dealing with my tax issues. After I received a lien on my income, their team quickly took action. The IRS promptly lifted the lien after Victory Tax Solutions team went to work! They did a wonderful job determining my taxable income, which was vital in determining my lien status. They promptly take my calls and answer my questions with clear and concise answers, I always know exactly what is going on with my case. They often call after hours to bridge the gap between time zones and their team works extra hours to make sure their clientele get the attention they need.
I am truly indebted to the great folks at Victory Tax Solutions and I recommend them to anyone that may be in need of their services!
